Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Holiday, you'll be centrally located in Bologna, steps from Piazza VIII Agosto and Teatro Arena del Sole. This hotel is within close proximity of Jewish Museum and Montagnola Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 35 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge at scheduled times.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Piazza VIII Agosto - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Teatro Arena del Sole - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Jewish Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Montagnola Park - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Palazzo Aldrovandi - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Civic Museum of the Middle Ages - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
San Giacomo Maggiore - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Santa Cecilia Oratory - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Teatro Comunale di Bologna - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Tower of the Asinelli - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Tower of the Garisenda - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Palazzo Re Enzo - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Fountain of Neptune - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Re Enzo Palace - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Mercato di Mezzo o Quadrilatero - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Holiday is Bologna (BLQ-Guglielmo Marconi) - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Holiday is Bologna (BLQ-Guglielmo Marconi) - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi.
